SecurityPermission.description: Access to the Accounts function of the application.
Reassign owner of an existing account.
Access to the Contacts function of the application.
Reassign owner of an existing contact.
Access to the Leads function of the application.
Reassign owner of an existing lead.
Delete a lead that hasn't been converted.
Access to the Opportunities function of the application.
Access to the Cases function of the application.
Access to the Activities function of the application.
View an Activity: Event or Task.
Create a new Activity: Event or Task.
Update an existing Activity: Event or Task.
Close an existing Activity: Event or Task.
Delete an existing Activity: Event or Task.
Allows manipulation of activites even when not the owner of said activities (bypass the Owner only configurable restriction).
View and set scope for public, private and confidential activities.
Allows manipulation of notes even when not the owner of said notes (bypass the Owner only configurable restriction).
Access to the Team Management function of the application.
Assign new members to an account or team
Update roles of account or team member
Access to forecast function of application.
Access to the Partners function of the application.
Access to the Quotes function of the application.
Access to the Orders function of the application.
Access to the Marketing function of the application
Update marketing campaigns in CRMSFA and add, update or remove contact lists to them.
View payment methods of a party.
Update payment methods of a party
View operations in the [Reports] tab and all of the reports inside it.
Access to the lead custom fields
Access to the contact custom fields
Access to the account custom fields

SecurityGroup.description: Sales Manager with permissions for all accounts, contacts, leads, opportunities, teams, etc.
Sales Representative with ability to create, view, and update accounts, leads, contacts, etc. but not manage teams or deactivate accounts
Sales Rep with ability to view only.
Sales Rep with access to apps and create new records but only view records he has been assigned to
B2B Customer Service Rep with permissions accounts, leads, contacts, cases, activities, opportunities, quotes, orders
B2C Customer Service Rep with permissions accounts, leads, contacts, cases, activities, orders
For testing: Permission to login and view basic screens only. No permission to see or modify data
Permissions granted to account owners, including view and update on the contacts of the account
Use CRMSFA for tasks, activities, and emails only
Use CRMSFA for tasks, activities, and emails only
System user privileges for automatically performed functions in CRM/SFA
